# UIBackgroundRefreshStatus.denied

**Case**

The user explicitly disabled background behavior for this app or for the whole system.

## Declaration

```swift
case denied
```

## Constants

- **UIBackgroundRefreshStatus.restricted**: Background updates are unavailable and the user cannot enable them again.
- **UIBackgroundRefreshStatus.available**: Background updates are available for the app.

items.description: Background updates are unavailable and the user cannot enable them again.
